short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this app, you can edit your website through the Chrome browser. Chrome App by AGXL Limited.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you like Chrome as much as we do? - If so, you are right here, because we love the browser. For this reason, we have developed a Chrome app. With this app, you can edit your website through the Chrome browser. Download the Chrome app now and edit your website directly from the "best browser in the world"! Do not have an account at AGXL? No problem! You can also sign up with the app. AGXL is your partner for your website. We offer the complete package for your perfect website, of course, all for free. Create with our editor your website in minutes. For this you will also need the right email address! Download now the app!
